title: Petey’s Funhouse
description: Join Petey for songs, story time, and visits from his grumpy neighbor, Saggy Naggy.
quote: What makes you special? The fact that you are special. But if everybody’s special, that kind of waters it down.
altHero: Peter Griffin dressed in tramp clown garb plays piano on a stage in front of a hand-stitched patchwork curtain
alt1: Peter reads a book to an audience of kids
alt2: Peter plays guitar for the kids
alt3: Peter talks to a hand puppet named Saggy Naggy that looks like his wife Lois
alt4: Peter stands near a large cage holding an angry mountain lion
